content: surface crochet 56 sts ©2024 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 5 surface crochet- optional surface crochet in each st around the outside of round 4 making sure to work through the points of the hexagram and fo round 7- with new color find the st directly above where you want the top point of the hexagram to be and begin in that st single_crochet into st directly above top star point single_crochet into next half_double_crochet next 2 sts double_crochet next 2 sts treble_crochet into next 2tr-ch2-2tr into next st treble_crochet into next double_crochet next 2 sts half_double_crochet next 2 sts single_crochet next 3 sts half_double_crochet next 2 sts double_crochet next 2 sts treble_crochet into next st x3 2tr-ch2-2tr into next st treble_crochet into next double_crochet next 2 sts half_double_crochet next 2 sts single_crochet into last st slip_stitch or ij to join and fo 68 sts ©2024 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 6 round 8- with new color begin in any chsp 2hdc-ch2-2hdc into chsp half_double_crochet next 17 sts x4 slip_stitch or ij to join and fo 84 sts round 9- with new color begin in any chsp 3sc into chsp single_crochet next 21 sts x4 slip_stitch or ij to join and fo 96 sts or begin in any chsp 2sc-ch2-2sc into chsp single_crochet next 21 sts x4 slip_stitch or ij to join and fo 100 sts ©2024 christine anne melvin/womanwalkingawire 7
